about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A little about me
about.description: My name is Diego. I'm a professional passionate about software development, committed to continuous improvement and digital creativity. Since I was young, I've been fascinated by technology and how it can solve real problems. I consider myself curious, self-taught, and always willing to learn something new. I constantly seek ways to combine design and functionality to create intuitive web experiences.

skills.description: I master a wide spectrum of modern technologies, from frontend to backend development, through databases and deployment tools. My focus is on creating scalable and maintainable solutions.
